data.title: SOAP: A Python Package for Calculating the Properties of Galaxies and Halos Formed in Cosmological Simulations
data.name: SOAP
data.description: Spherical Overdensity Aperture Processor: MPI parallel Python code to compute properties of halos in SWIFT n-body simulations

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

evidence: "This repository contains programs which can be used to compute properties of halos in spherical apertures in SWIFT snapshots."
"The second program, `SOAP/compute_halo_properties.py`, reads the simulation snapshot ... and uses it to calculate halo properties."
